name: Seventh Generation Multi Purpose Wipes All Purpose Cleaning Garden Mint scent with 100% Essential Oils and Botanical Ingredients 70 count, Pack of 3
short_description: Cleaning wipes that work on most home surfaces
Safe and effective surface cleaner for everyday messes
Garden mint scent made from 100 percent essential oils and botanical ingredients
0 percent synthetic fragrances or dyes
Convenient and easy to use multi purpose cleaner
product_description: Make quick work of everyday messes with Seventh Generation’s Multi Purpose Wipes. They’re perfect as an all purpose cleaner for anytime cleaning on kitchen counters, appliances, bathrooms, kids’ toys—and most surfaces in your busy home. Our all purpose cleaner wipes are a 98 percent USDA Certified Biobased product, providing a powerful clean with one-step convenience, and without dyes or synthetic fragrances. Plus, our garden mint scent is made from essential oils and botanical ingredients, for a smell that’s delightfully refreshing and isn’t overpowering. At Seventh Generation we do business differently. We believe our multipurpose cleaner and cleaning supplies are healthy solutions for use within your home–and for the community and environment outside of it. We are always evaluating how to reduce their environmental impact, increase performance and safety, and create a more sustainable supply chain. We believe it is our responsibility to set a course for a more mindful way of doing business, where companies act as partners with other stakeholders to create a brighter future for the whole planet. Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation cleaning products, you’re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations.

name: Clorox Scentiva Disinfecting Wipes, Lavender and Jasmine, 75 Count (Package May Vary)
short_description: SCENTED DISINFECTING WIPES: Clean, disinfect and enjoy a long lasting, fresh scent with these bleach free all in one cleaning wipes; Package may vary
LAVENDER AND JASMINE SCENT: From a curated collection of Clorox Scentiva fragrances, experience the floral aroma of lavender and jasmine mixed with sultry rose and hyacinth to transport the senses
DISINFECTS AND CLEANS: Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria (1), including COVID 19 (1) Virus, in 15 seconds with the cleaning power of Clorox and the fragrance of Scentiva
ALL PURPOSE WIPE: Clear drying formula breaks down grease, soap, scum, and grime so you can tackle any surface with confidence; Prevents bacteria (2) growth for up to 24 hours
DISPOSABLE WIPES: This 75 count canister of disposable, disinfecting wipes feature a Lavender and Jasmine scent by Scentiva; do not flush wipes
product_description: Clean and disinfect your home while enjoying the captivating, long lasting scent of Lavender and Jasmine with these bleach free, all in one cleaning wipes. Clorox Scentiva Disinfecting Wipes kill 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID 19 (1) Virus, in 15 seconds when used as directed on hard nonporous surfaces. These multi surface wipes leave long lasting freshness and use a clear drying formula that powers through grease, soap scum and grime, so you can tackle any surface with confidence. Clorox Scentiva Disinfecting Wipes even eliminate odors and prevent bacteria growth (2) for up to 24 hours. Germs and messes occur on more than kitchen counters and bathroom surfaces. Safely wipe down garbage cans, sinks, toys, remotes and appliances, or clean up car spills with these non bleach sanitizing wipes. Do not flush. (1) Kills SARS CoV 2 on hard nonporous surfaces. Use as directed for other germs. (2) Prevents growth of odor causing bacteria on non food contact surfaces.

name: Method All-Purpose Cleaning Wipes, Pink Grapefruit, Multi-Surface, Compostable, 70 Count (Pack of 1)
short_description: Contains (1) canister of 70 all purpose cleaning wipes.
Compostable* cleaning wet wipes. *Under municipal conditions.
Cuts through grease + grime.
Cleans most non-porous surfaces including counters, tile, stone, wood and glass.
Cruelty free. Tested by people, not on animals.
Canister (minus lid) made from 70% recycled plastic (PCR).
Pink Grapefruit scent is a peppy fusion of pink grapefruit, blood orange + cassis.
product_description: Grease + grime don't stand a chance. Not with plant-based cleaning agents on your side. Each compostable* wipe, in all its great-smelling glory, packs a powerful cleaning punch, with cleansers derived from corn + coconut. They wisk away spills + splatters with ease, leaving behind the plasant smell of victory. *Wipes will biodegrade under municipal composting conditions. Not suitable for backyard composting.

name: Loom Wipes All Purpose Natural Cleaning Wipes - Vinegar & Citrus Powered Multi Surface Cleaner - 50 Count
short_description: All Purpose and Multi Surface - Keep high-touch areas of your home spotless, without harsh chemicals, fumes, or residues. For kitchen and bathroom counters, microwaves, fridges, appliances, yoga mats, gym equipment, saunas, and everything in between.
Vinegar Powered Clean – Uses the natural cleaning strength of vinegar and citrus to cut through dirt, grease, and grime. No ammonia, bleach, or other harsh chemicals.
People and Pet Friendly - Our made in America natural cleaning wipes are perfect for health-conscious households.
Natural Ingredients – Formulated with only 5 plant-based ingredients used in food products: Vinegar, Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Citrate, and D-Limonene.
Natural Citrus Scent – Our formula removes vinegar’s sharpness and leaves a light citrus scent.
Quick and Convenient – Our 50 count wipes make natural cleaning easy, no spray bottle or rag needed.

name: Nice 'N Clean Disinfecting Surface Wipes 304ct | Cleans & Disinfects Home & Kitchen Surfaces | Fresh & Lemon Scent
short_description: ONE-STEP CLEANING - Nice 'N CLEAN Disinfecting Wipes are designed to clean, sanitize, and disinfect household surfaces in your home, kitchen, bathroom, office, or classroom; These disposable, wet wipes can be used on any hard, nonporous surfaces

KILLS VIRUSES and BACTERIA -Our multi-purpose disinfectant wipes kill 99.9% of bacteria and viruses, including the COVID-19 virus, in 3 minutes; Plus, each wipe is 60% larger than the leading household wipe so you can clean more surface area

SUSTAINABLY MADE - Our all-purpose, disinfectant wipes are sustainably made with renewable plant-based fibers from trees in environmentally managed forests; Plus, our soft-pack packaging uses 81% less plastic than hard canisters

CONVENIENT and PORTABLE - Our soft-packs fit perfectly and easily stack up in the pantry for convenient storage; The portable, travel-friendly design makes it easy to throw in a purse or backpack while our resealable flip-top lid helps the wipes stay moist

PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA - Nice ’N CLEAN Disinfecting Wipes are proudly manufactured in the USA with domestic and imported materials; Nothing is more important to us than the quality of our wipes and the health and safety of the people who use them
product_description: Nice ‘N Clean Disinfecting Wipes are pre-moistened wipes that contain a proprietary solution specially developed to clean, deodorize, sanitize, and disinfect. They have regular and scrubbing applicators designed to help you tackle a variety of cleaning challenges at home, at the office, and at school - wherever you need a convenient way to clean. Our disinfectant wipes have been clinically shown to kill viruses* and bacteria**. They come in soft-pack packages that are easier to take on-the-go. *Effective against common cold virus caused by Coronavirus and common flu virus caused by Influenza A H3N2 Virus **Effective against Escherichia coli (E. coli), Salmonella enterica (Salmonella), Staphylococcus aureus (Staph), Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Listeria monocytogenes (Listeria), Streptococcus pyogenes (Strep), Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) ɸKills SARS-CoV-2 on hard, nonporous surfaces. Wipe size is 9.8" x 8.2" vs. 7" x 7"

short_description: Highly Effective Formula: Our Super Sani-Cloth wipe boasts an impressive 55.5% of active germicidal agents, including quat and alcohol, ensuring unmatched effectiveness in sanitation

Material Compatibility: Unlike other hydrogen peroxide-based products, our wipe is meticulously designed to be gentle on materials, maintaining a neutral pH to prevent degradation while delivering powerful disinfection
Rapid Action: Experience rapid bactericidal, tuberculocidal, fungicidal, and virucidal action within just 2 minutes, making it a quick and reliable choice for hygiene and sanitation
Versatile and Comprehensive: Combat 32 different microorganisms with this versatile wipe, making it your all-in-one solution for a wide range of surfaces and materials

product_description: Behind every smooth-running household, there’s Clorox Disinfecting Wipes. Clorox Disinfecting Wipes kill 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including cold and flu, E. Coli, Salmonella, Staph, and Strep. The quick and easy way to clean and disinfect with just one product, Clorox Disinfecting Wipes work on a variety of surfaces, including mirrors and glass, finished hardwood and even greasy kitchen counters and appliances. The powerful cleaning technology dissolves kitchen grease, fights soap scum, and kills 99.9% of common household germs. These pre-moistened wipes are also great for cleaning and fighting germs outside the home. Keep them in your purse, store them in your car and stash them in your desk at work. This canister contains 35 disinfecting wipes in Citrus Blend Scent.

name: Seventh Generation Disinfecting Multi-Surface Wipes, Lemongrass Citrus, 70 Count, Pack of 3 (Packaging May Vary)
short_description: Convenient disinfectant wipes for daily touch-ups and tough cleaning jobs, clean and disinfect in one easy step
A disinfectant that kills 99.99% of bacteria and viruses*
Disinfectant cleaner with no rinse required, even on food contact surfaces and children’s toys
Botanical disinfectant wipes with the active ingredient Thymol (a component of Thyme Oil)
Leaves home smelling fresh and clean, a disinfectant with a Lemongrass Citrus Scent made with essential oils and botanical extracts
Caring today for the next seven generations with Seventh Generation; try our disinfecting spray and other household cleaners
product_description: Clean doesn’t have to be complicated. Seventh Generation Disinfecting Wipes clean and disinfect in one easy step, killing 99.99% of household germs including cold and flu viruses* Our one-step disinfecting formula is designed for the hard, non-porous surfaces in every room in the house and does not require a rinse, even on food contact surfaces. The convenient wipes can be used for daily touch-ups or tough cleaning jobs. Our Lemongrass Citrus Scent Disinfectant cleaner is scented with essential oils and botanical ingredients and leave your home smelling fresh and clean. This EPA registered disinfectant can be used around kids and pets and is suitable for use on all hard non-porous surfaces including children’s toys, pacifiers, gym equipment, food contact surfaces, doorknobs, bathroom surfaces, and more. Seventh Generation is committed to being a brand of environmentally conscious and effective household and personal-care products. Our disinfectant wipes, sprays, and cleaners are solutions for the hard non-porous surfaces within your home. Make sure to try our other household cleaners to keep your home clean; stone cleaner, glass cleaner, granite cleaner, toilet bowl cleaner, bathroom tile cleaner, and all of our Seventh Generation products. A partnership with the CleanWell Company, makers of the disinfectant formula based on an essential oil, brings you a line of Seventh Generation Disinfecting wipes with CleanWell Inside. * Kills over 99.99% of household germs, specifically: Influenza A virus, H1N1, Rhinovirus type 37, Methicilin-resistant S. aureus (MRSA), Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella enterica, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa on hard, non-porous surfaces.
